text_block_list.text: One day while training with Vivlos――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……Huuuh~?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hmmm-……it feels like something is off today? Like my body feels heavy. It kind of felt like I couldn't hit my stride~.
choice_data_list: Then, let's call it a day

text_block_list.text: If she was feeling off, then it was probably better not to push it. I was curious about the cause……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's not that something feels wrong with my body though! At times like these, you see~

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: The only cure is that♡ C'mon, Tore-cchi, let's go, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Kyaa~ so cute! This is another new product, isn't it♡?

text_block_list.name: Shop Clerk
text_block_list.text: Yes♪ These ear cuffs can also be used like rings, and they work well with other accessories from the same series!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: No way, no way, something like that would definitely be cute! Onee-san, can you wrap them both up♪?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Tore-cchi, pick something that'll go well with these! With so many good products, it's hard to make a decision, you know?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's go look at some clothes next! Which one do you think looks good? Maybe those white shorts and that pink tucked mini♪?

text_block_list.name: Shop Clerk
text_block_list.text: That tuck mini skirt arrived just today! The fabric is quite durable so you could use it all the way until early autumn♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ohh, I see! Then I'll go with this♪ In that case, I want a top to go with it! Which ones are new products?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Haa~~, that was super fun!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I managed to buy a bunch of new stuff. Yeah, with this, tomorrow I'll be full of energy♪
choice_data_list: It was all new stuff wasn't it?
It was all new stuff wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: But it's more exciting that way!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: That excitement helps me feel amazing! Like I could do anything♡ or something like that~

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ehe♡ I'll show you the power of that excitement tomorrow, Tore-cchi♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Haa――haa――! ……Not yet, not yet, I can keep going~~~~~~!!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――Hyuiii~~~! Did ya see that? Tore-cchi!
choice_data_list: So that was the power of 『Excitement』……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: You got that right♡ I'm so filled with excitement that I can run like whooosh!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ehe! If i'm filled with so much excitement like this, then someday――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely end up in Dubai!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: All sparkly! Like a super celeb! Like a bright dream that'll never fade……that world!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: For that I'll need more……way moooooore! With this excitement, I'll need to keep doing my best!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: That's right! So Tore-cchi, you need to reaaaally help me stay excited――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Oh? Some kind of notification……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Aaaahーー! Oh no!! That shop we went to yesterday has another new product!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: How much more is left of today's training? I'll work hard so afterwards, come shopping with me! Okay, please!?
All of this was for Vivlos' dream, and her motivation. I felt that raising her 『Excitement』 was going to be important.
